characters.name: Levi "Macca" MacDonald
characters.natureDescription: Take great joy out of your passion. Your strength is Passion, while your weakness is Intemperance.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower whenever you pursue or manage to convert another character to your passion. Lose Willpower when denied or suffering a disastrous failure.
characters.demeanorDescription: Work to bring order into strife. Your strength is Organization, while your weakness is a Lack of Tolerance.
characters.backgroundNote: Macca’s never been to Alamut, but he’s seen it through a rifle scope. That’s close enough as far as he’s concerned. Macca has his own agenda, and it doesn’t involve kneeling before the Old Man in the Mountain. In life, Macca was a decorated soldier of the Australian Army. He signed up for the love of his country and the desire to fire big guns, but after two decades of service an offer of retirement arose, with a well-paid contract for a so-called “First Team” of mercenaries. He didn’t hesitate in applying for discharge. Macca’s time with the First Team changed him, as he repeatedly witnessed terrible atrocities, often perpetrated by the companies he was protecting. Several missions were civilian assassinations and, though he voiced objections, they went ahead and he played his part. Macca feared the First Team would execute his family back home if he showed a desire to back out. One wetworks objective had him shooting a target as she engaged in a nighttime meeting with her friends. The squad were to use hot rounds to send a message to the target’s group. Macca attempted to inform the target ahead of time, but his fellow mercenaries murdered her before he could send a warning. The victim’s allies easily tracked and attacked the hired guns, killing the shooter before seizing Macca. The target was a prophet, they said. Only she knew the route to Golconda, and her death set the group back centuries. An incredulous Macca didn’t believe a word, until he witnessed these vampires’ powers. He desperately pledged to avenge the victim’s death, but this wasn’t enough. Once Embraced and shown the capacity of his strengths and limitations as a vampire, the disciples made it clear: Macca must continue what his victim started. Macca’s time with the coterie resulted in his gaining a glimpse of Golconda. He now seeks clues to its path, and focuses his ire and rifle on eliminating those who would use Golconda as a means of manipulation. He’s got no time to listen to false prophets, so he punishes liars and charlatans in an effort to discover the pure road from among the weeds. Macca’s spent more time consorting with Camarilla loremasters than any other, and in turn has become a useful asset to the Sect. He’ll turn his guns on whoever he’s paid to kill, providing the target doesn’t conflict with his interests. He’s still hunted by the corporation that hired the First Team. Somehow, they know he’s not fully dead. The Australian Camarilla protect his family, and to date haven’t used them as blackmail against him. They know Macca’s more useful when happy and willing.
characters.descriptionNote: Macca’s receding hairline, paunch, and shadowed eyes mean he’s not a looker. He’s stocky, and lopes lazily with his shoulders hunched. There’s something darkly appealing to him though, in the sinister smile between his moustache and chin strip, and the way his gaze never wavers. In his role as a killer for hire, Macca knows not to dress ostentatiously — unless the job requires it. He wears heavy jackets in which he can hold weapons, often carries a case, and has been known to wear rolled-neck sweaters just because they provide another place in which to hold a small explosive or blade.
characters.roleplayingHints: Macca’s all business when talking about a hit. He doesn’t believe in joking about killing, even when he’s dismissive of a victim. He thinks death-related puns are the purview of soft sods who’ve not experienced war or fired a gun for a living. When on the subject of Golconda, Macca is sober. He’s not a true believer, but knows he must atone by allowing others to attempt to discover the path. He feels it’s his duty to protect those who seek the nigh-mythical state. Macca’s broad Australian accent is uncultivated. He’s proud of his heritage and speaks fondly of his time in the army and back home, despite feeling he can never return. He’s decidedly irreverent and tells vulgar anecdotes freely, when not caught on a somber topic.

characters.name: Celeritas
characters.natureDescription: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself
characters.demeanorDescription: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.

characters.name: RubberMan
characters.natureDescription: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself
characters.demeanorDescription: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.

characters.name: Dr IQ
characters.natureDescription: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself
characters.demeanorDescription: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.

characters.name: Magma
characters.natureDescription: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself
characters.demeanorDescription: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.

characters.name: Tornado
characters.natureDescription: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
characters.natureRegain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself
characters.demeanorDescription: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.

archetypes.name: Addict
archetypes.description: Become utterly fixated on one passion.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you gorge yourself on a chosen passion

archetypes.name: Adherent
archetypes.description: Pledge yourself to one cause above everything else.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you remain loyal to your cause despite hardships

archetypes.name: Adjudicator
archetypes.description: Work to solve problems that affect your surroundings
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your attempts of providing solutions yield immediate results

archetypes.name: Alpha
archetypes.description: Lead other by example.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your leadership is proven to be the most beneficial

archetypes.name: Architect
archetypes.description: Strive to create something out of a sense of greater purpose. Your strength is Purpose, while your weakness is Obsession.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you establish something of lasting value

archetypes.name: Artiste
archetypes.description: Try to reach others through your creations
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you reach an audience through your works

archetypes.name: Autocrat
archetypes.description: Seek power and prominence for its own sake. Your strength is Leadership and your weakness is Dictatorship.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you gain control over a group or organization of other individuals.

archetypes.name: Barbarian
archetypes.description: Keep your distance from civilization, instead trusting the old ways
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you prove the values of your “barbaric” ways over civilization

archetypes.name: Benefactor
archetypes.description: Work to protect the people around you. Your strength is Altruism, while your weakness is Obligation.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you do something someone else desperately needs.

archetypes.name: Beta
archetypes.description: Act as supporter for your group’s superior
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your counsel proves beneficial for the group. Lose Willpower when the leader is proven inefficient.

archetypes.name: Bon Vivant
archetypes.description: Try to enjoy life as long as it lasts. Your strength is your Love of Life, while your weakness is Hedonism.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you truly enjoy yourself

archetypes.name: Bravo
archetypes.description: Use your power to bully others into submission. Your strength is Strength, while your weakness is Anger.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you achieve your agenda through brutishness or intimidation

archetypes.name: Capitalist
archetypes.description: Strive to make profit by selling your commodities
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you make a successful sale

archetypes.name: Caregiver
archetypes.description: Take comfort in consoling others. Your strength is Compassion, while your weakness comes from Smothering.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you nurture someone else.

archetypes.name: Caretaker
archetypes.description: Shepherd the flock around you to safety. Your strength is a Sense of Duty, while your weakness is Impatience.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you avert a disaster from your flock.

archetypes.name: Celebrant
archetypes.description: Take great joy out of your passion. Your strength is Passion, while your weakness is Intemperance.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you pursue or manage to convert another character to your passion. Lose Willpower when denied or suffering a disastrous failure.

archetypes.name: Chameleon
archetypes.description: Constantly alter your mannerisms and appearance
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you fool someone into thinking you’re someone else for your benefit

archetypes.name: Child
archetypes.description: Be ignorant about the larger world around you. Your strength is Innocence, while your weakness is Immaturity.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you convince someone else to take care about you and your problems without benefit for themselves

archetypes.name: Competitor
archetypes.description: Put yourself against the world’s odds. Your strength is Striving, while your weakness is Competiveness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you succeed at a challenge

archetypes.name: Conformist
archetypes.description: Play your strengths in groups. Your strength is cooperation, while your weakness is Low Self-Esteem.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when your group achieves a goal thanks to your support

archetypes.name: Conniver
archetypes.description: Seek ways to let others work for you. Your strength is Cleverness, while your weakness is Envy.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you trick someone to serve your interests

archetypes.name: Coward
archetypes.description: Hide your true self from all others
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your reveal something about yourself without being rejected

archetypes.name: Creep Show
archetypes.description: Strive to inspire shock and disgust for show
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever someone is appalled by your actions

archetypes.name: Crusader
archetypes.description: Fight for an ideal of yours. Your strength is Zeal, while your weakness is Fanaticism.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you do something great in the name of a higher cause.

archetypes.name: Curmudgeon
archetypes.description: Constantly expect the worst to happen. Your strength is your Critical Eye, while your weakness is your Lack of Imagination.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever someone does something specific and negative, just like you said they would

archetypes.name: Dabbler
archetypes.description: Seek to find new interests
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you devote yourself to a new interest on the cost of an old one

archetypes.name: Defender
archetypes.description: Protect something over yourself
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you successfully defend your charge

archetypes.name: Deviant
archetypes.description: Reject traditional social mores for your own. Your strength is your ability to Shatter Boundaries, while your weakness is Perversion.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you manage to flout social customs

archetypes.name: Devil’s Advocate
archetypes.description: Question the commands from your superiors. Your strength is Scepticism, while your weakness is Contrariness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when your questions reveal flaws in a plan or structure.

archetypes.name: Director
archetypes.description: Work to bring order into strife. Your strength is Organization, while your weakness is a Lack of Tolerance.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you influence a group to fulfil a difficult task

archetypes.name: Enigma
archetypes.description: Work to keep your true intentions hidden
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever someone is perplexed by your actions

archetypes.name: Eye of the Storm
archetypes.description: Find yourself constantly in the centre of unrest
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever a ruckus, riot, or less violent but equally chaotic phenomenon occurs around you.

archetypes.name: Explorer
archetypes.description: Strive to discover new places and experiences
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you sample something new

archetypes.name: Fanatic
archetypes.description: Pledge yourself to one goal over all else. Your strength is Dedication, while your weakness is Stubbornness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you accomplish a goal directly related to your cause

archetypes.name: Fatalist
archetypes.description: Follow the inescapable course of destiny
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever someone receives your personal interpretation of destiny

archetypes.name: Futurist
archetypes.description: Pledge yourself to new concepts and ideals
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you first come upon a progressive idea or object

archetypes.name: Gambler
archetypes.description: Trust in luck to take care of you.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you succeed against difficult odds

archetypes.name: Gallant
archetypes.description: Seek attention and adulation from others. Your strength is Artistry, while your weakness is Flamboyance.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you impress another person

archetypes.name: Guru
archetypes.description: Lead others to spiritual fulfilment
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever someone seeks out your help in spiritual matters and your guidance moves that individual to an enlightened action that she normally would not have taken or you gain a personal epiphany

archetypes.name: Heretic
archetypes.description: Refuse to accept a commonly held creed. Your strength is Integrity, while your weakness is Iconoclasm.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your challenge commonly held convictions and convince other people of your belief

archetypes.name: Hunter
archetypes.description: Always prepare yourself for the hunt
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you manage to outperform a rival or defeat your prey through cunning and patience

archetypes.name: Idealist
archetypes.description: Believe into a higher ideal than yourself
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when your ideal furthers your goals and brings your ideal closer to fruition.

archetypes.name: Judge
archetypes.description: Seek to improve the system by using rational conclusions. Your strength is Justice, your weakness your Lack of Vision.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you correctly solve a problem by considering the evidence presented, or when one of your arguments unites dissenting parties.

archetypes.name: Loner
archetypes.description: Keep your own company. Your strength is Self-Reliance, while your weakness is a Lack of Empathy.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you achieve something alone that will still benefit your group

archetypes.name: Machine
archetypes.description: Push yourself to your limits to transcend mortal weakness. Your strength is Work Ethic, your weakness is Burn-Out.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you manage to press on and transcend the limits of flesh.

archetypes.name: Maniac
archetypes.description: Be compelled by internal voices to strange actions
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you fulfill a goal of the voices that goes against your immediate self-interests

archetypes.name: Martyr
archetypes.description: Sacrifice yourself for your cause. Your strength is Sacrifice, your weakness is Self-Deprecation.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you suffer some amount of damage or loss of a definable resource for your ideals or another’s immediate gain.

archetypes.name: Masochist
archetypes.description: Draw pleasure from suffering and testing your boundaries. Your strength is Devotion, while your weakness is Self-Destructiveness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when your own suffering leads to some tangible gain for you, and two points of Willpower whenever you experience pain in a truly unique way.

archetypes.name: Meddler
archetypes.description: Constantly try to interfere into other’s affairs to aid them
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when your interference proves beneficial despite protests

archetypes.name: Melancholic
archetypes.description: Feel ennui at all that you have lost
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you cause other to question their cursed natures

archetypes.name: Monster
archetypes.description: Seek to understand your own depravity by acting on it. Your strength is your Mirror of Villainy, while your weakness is Depravity.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your further vices associated with your monstrousness

archetypes.name: Omega
archetypes.description: Accept your place at the bottom rung of your group.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you achieve a deed that should be worthy of recognition

archetypes.name: Outsider
archetypes.description: Define yourself by things you do not participate in
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you learn something about yourself through decisions that are made by others

archetypes.name: Paragon
archetypes.description: Embody straightforwardness and simplicity in your actions
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your straight dealings prove most successful over deception

archetypes.name: Pedagogue
archetypes.description: Share your knowledge with those around you. Your strength is Knowledge, your weakness is Logorrhea.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you see or learn of someone who has benefited from the wisdom you shared with them.

archetypes.name: Penitent
archetypes.description: Strive to do penance for your sins. Your strength is Responsibility, while your weakness is Contrition.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you feel that you have achieved absolution for a given grievance.

archetypes.name: Perfectionist
archetypes.description: Work to achieve the best result possible. Your strength is Exactitude, while your weakness is Incompleteness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your work has no discernible flaws

archetypes.name: Quaestor
archetypes.description: Yearn to answer life’s questions
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you reach a concise life lesson that could become a rule of thumb

archetypes.name: Rebel
archetypes.description: Fight against established authorities. Your strength is Individuality, while your weakness is your Lack of Direction.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your actions adversely affect your opposition

archetypes.name: Rogue
archetypes.description: Focus on your own gain over that of others. Your strength is Valor, while your weakness is Selfishness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your self-focus leads to profit

archetypes.name: Sadist
archetypes.description: Inflict pain and misery on others.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you inflict pain on another person for your own amusement

archetypes.name: Scientist
archetypes.description: Work to achieve understanding of your surroundings via a critical method.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever a logical, systematic approach to a problem helps you solve it, or information gathered logically is of use in another, similar situation.

archetypes.name: Seer
archetypes.description: Glimpses of the future haunt you
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your visions shed light on an enigma or allow someone greater insights

archetypes.name: Sociopath
archetypes.description: Strive to eradicate weakness
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you are the greatest contributor to a body count after everything has settled down

archetypes.name: Soldier
archetypes.description: Work within the chain of command to fulfil your duties
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you fulfil your mission by following orders or when following orders turned out to be the best course of a mission

archetypes.name: Stoic
archetypes.description: Maintain your composure under all circumstances
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you overcome serious setbacks and losses without giving into strong emotions

archetypes.name: Survivor
archetypes.description: Strive to survive all odds. Your strength is Perseverance, while your weakness is a Lack of Trust.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you survive a dangerous situation or others do thanks to your counsel

archetypes.name: Thrill-Seeker
archetypes.description: Actively seek the rush of danger. Your strength is Daring, while your weakness is Recklessness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you succeed at a dangerous task that you have deliberately undertaken.

archetypes.name: Traditionalist
archetypes.description: Keep on established routines. Your strength is Consistency, while your weakness is Complacency.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever the proven way turns out to be the best

archetypes.name: Trickster
archetypes.description: Find humour and the absurd in all situations. Your strength is Empathy, your weakness is Hypocrisy.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you manage to lift others’ spirits, especially if you are able to assuage your own pain in the process.

archetypes.name: Tycoon
archetypes.description: Constantly plot to expand your resources. Your strength is Savviness, while your weakness is Greed.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever your plans yield maximum of influence and profit

archetypes.name: Vigilante
archetypes.description: Succeed in your vengeance against a chosen target. Your strength is Single-Mindedness, your weakness is Blood-Blindness.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower when you significantly hurt your target

archetypes.name: Visionary
archetypes.description: See beyond the mundane to focus on what things should be. Your strength is Imagination, your weakness is Pride.
archetypes.regain: Regain Willpower whenever you are able to convince others to have faith in your dreams and follow the course of action dictated by your vision.
